revised_title: On a Rapid Contact-Breaker and the Phenomena of the Flow in Spectral Analysis
tldr: The author developed a new contact-breaker device to study the flow and behavior of spectral lines in the solar spectrum. The device allowed for precise control over the break and steadiness of the striae, enabling the observation of steady and flowing spectral lines. The author also investigated the relationship between the flow and resistance in the spectral lines.
